content: Warehouse #1: Plastic resin pellets stock: 500 kg after run #MOLD-A1. Reorder threshold: 300 kg.
Warehouse #2: Steel sheet stock: 1000 sheets for stamping. Next run #STMP-B2 scheduled soon.
Assembly parts bin: 200 motor units, 300 wiring harnesses. For run #ASSY-D4.
Paint booth supplies: 50 gallons paint, 30 gallons primer left. Next reorder likely after #PAINT-E5.
Robot welding rods: 80 rods left, 1 spool MIG wire. Enough for 2 more runs #WELD-C3.
